Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: XXX
Description: XXX with thin walls and trefoil orifice (?). The ovoid body has a high conical neck and a flat protruding base with a flat vertical handle between the lip and the shoulder. The decoration comprises four incised horizontal lines below the lip and at the base of the neck. There is also an incised zigzag motif beneath these lines in the upper section of the neck.
